snippet: YouTube is adding about 100 entertainment channels as part of its broader mission to bring some order to its chaos, and to attract a steadier stream of viewers and advertisers, reports Ben Sisario in Monday's New York Times.
abstract: YouTube is adding about 100 entertainment channels as part of its broader mission to bring some order to its chaos, and to attract a steadier stream of viewers and advertisers, reports Ben Sisario in Monday's New York Times.

headline.main: New Layer of Content Amid YouTube's Chaos
